ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Necros are supposed to be overpowered :). Verant stated this before that necros would be a extremly powerful class in the end. BTW shamans can do the same
ygData.messageBody:
Necros are supposed to be overpowered :). Verant stated this before that
necros would be a extremly powerful class in the end. BTW shamans can do the
same thing and they don't even have faction cuts or horribley hard to find
research spells. Even a enchanter who is smart can have little to no down
time.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 2:09 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
>
>Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Again why ? I don't care about exp anymore. FYI if it supposts 3 full
groups
>> of 50's on your server then they are doing something wrong. I can pull
and
>> solo 1 sea fury non stop...
>>
>> Naeeldar
>
>Three groups of six 50s is too much, certainly, but it does support three
high
>level groups. The fact that YOU can solo them non-stop simply suggests to
me
>(yet again, for the umpteenth time) that Necros are tremendously unbalanced
and
>vastly overpowered.
>
>Kenross Cantorforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
